en.title: MCP Overview: Choosing the Right Integration Surface
en.excerpt: How to evaluate server fit by auth requirements, operational ownership, and long-term maintainability.
en.seoTitle: MCP Overview: Choosing the Right Integration Surface
en.seoDescription: Evaluate MCP server fit with architecture-first criteria: ownership, auth model, and lifecycle costs.

contentBlocks.heading: Integration surface is a long-term decision
paragraphs: Choosing a server only by feature list causes hidden costs later in maintenance and incident response.
The better decision model starts with lifecycle ownership, compliance limits, and error visibility.

contentBlocks.heading: Score candidates with architectural criteria
paragraphs: Use a weighted matrix instead of subjective selection.
Even lightweight scoring reveals which option is operationally safe and which is only fast in demos.
